# isEligibleForPrediction

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether Siri can suggest the user activity as a shortcut to the user.

## Declaration

```swift
var isEligibleForPrediction: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

To donate a user activity to Siri Shortcuts, set [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserActivity/isEligibleForPrediction] to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] and make the user activity current. To make the user activity current, call the activity’s [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserActivity/becomeCurrent()] method, or assign it to the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/UIKit/UIResponder/userActivity] property on a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/UIKit/UIViewController] or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/UIKit/UIResponder] object. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SiriKit/donating-shortcuts].

## Donating to Siri Shortcuts

- **suggestedInvocationPhrase**: A phrase suggested to the user when they create a shortcut.
- **shortcutAvailability**: A set of defined contexts in which an intent or activity might be relevant to a user.
